message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $140 for it.
I understand that $180 might be a bit high for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can sell the product to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $130?
I understand that $160 was still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $155.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $130?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $150, which is my minimum price.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $125?
I'm not willing to go any lower than my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your offer and my minimum. I can sell the product to you for $137.50.

I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your minimum and my previous offer. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $132.50?
